questions.question: What type of paint do you use?
questions.answer: We primarily use high-quality, professional-grade paints from trusted brands like Sherwin-Williams and Benjamin Moore. The specific type (e.g., latex, oil-based, low-VOC) will be chosen based on the surface, desired finish, and environmental considerations for your project.

questions.question: Do I need to prepare my home before painting?
questions.answer: While we ask clients to remove small, delicate items and clear pathways, Joe the Painter handles all the heavy lifting for preparation. This includes moving and covering large furniture, protecting floors, patching, sanding, and priming surfaces to ensure a flawless finish. Your convenience is our priority!

questions.question: How long does a painting project typically take?
questions.answer: The duration varies greatly depending on the scope of work, size of the area, and complexity. During your free consultation, Joe will provide a detailed timeline and keep you informed every step of the way to minimize disruption.
